cause.description:
It is pretty simple. Finlandia imported is preferred for hamburgers, but Sargento is decent if the deli is closed and all is available is the pre-packaged corporate cheese.
Either way...Cam is all about good swiss cheese.
1. Cam's need for Swiss cheese must end immeadiately
2. American Cheese is inferior...as are all yellow cheeses
cause.mission: Get Cam a half pound of Swiss Cheese
cause.name: Cam is out of swiss cheese and needs some!
